actions.description: The gem stalker makes four Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

languages: telepathy 60 ft. understands Draconic but can't speak
name: Gem Stalker

specialTraits.description: The gem stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: The gem stalker doesn't require food or drink.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
